channel.title: Ban user denied for account name admin

item.title: Ban user denied for account name admin
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 2) {
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”));
sendMessage(“Server Administrator Cannot Be Banned!”);
} else if
String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " + playerName + " is banning "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;}

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 05:18:31 pm[/size][hr]in case the above one doesn’t work

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 2) {
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”));
sendMessage(“Server Administrator Cannot Be Banned!”);
} else if {
String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " + playerName + " is banning "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;}

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 05:20:46 pm[/size][hr]and JUST in case that above one doesn’t work, try this

        if (command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")); {
		sendMessage("Server Administrator Cannot Be Banned!");
	} else if {
            String victim = command.substring(8);

            PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " + playerName + " is banning "
                    + victim;
            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
            appendToBanned(victim);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;}

item.source: Ban user denied for account name admin

item.title: Ban user denied for account name admin
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”) means only the person with the account name of Admin can ban people
and also, that is the wrong code, do this
if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " + playerName + " is banning "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter(
                            "C:/Desktop/SERVER FOLDER NAME/logs/banlogs.txt",
                            true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("unban") && playerRights >= 2) { // made by Musicmad
        File file = new File("./data/bannedusers.txt");

        if (file.exists()) {
            String victim = command.substring(5);

            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully unbanned"); // made by Musicmad	
            try {
                BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
                BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file));
                String unban = command.substring(6);
                String inFile;

                while ((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) {
                    if (inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unban)) {// Leave this blank we dont want it to write a file.
                    } else {
                        out.write(inFile); // made by Musicmad
                    }

                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        } else {
            System.out.println("Error unbanning user"); 	
        }
    }

sendMessage(“Server Administrator cannot be banned”);
}
